      • loadTruck

        public Furniture[] loadTruck()
                      throws WrongLocationException,
                             TruckLoadException
        Loads a piece of furniture onto the truck from the store
        Returns:
        Furniture on the truck after loading
        Throws:
        WrongLocationException - If the truck is not at the factory when this method is called
        TruckLoadException - If the truck is full when this method is called

      • unloadTruck

        public Furniture[] unloadTruck(Store store)
                        throws WrongLocationException,
                               TruckLoadException
        Unloads a piece of furniture from the truck into a store
        Parameters:
        store - The store to unload the truck into
        Returns:
        Furniture on the track after unloading
        Throws:
        WrongLocationException - If the truck is not at a store when this method is called
        TruckLoadException - If the truck is empty when this method is called

        public void dispatchTruck()
                   throws FurnitureTrackerNotInitializedException
        Moves the truck to the next location
        Throws:
        FurnitureTrackerNotInitializedException - If furniture tracker is not initialized
